title: Distribution of consumer transactions worldwide 2018 , by payment channel
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 11 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response In-store and lowest at Response Smart home device.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response In-store has the highest Share of respondents and Smart home device has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 11 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response In-store and lowest at Response Smart home device.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Response is 2.0.
Response Other online has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
The Response In-store has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Other online, and Buy buttons. Down to the Response Smart home device which is the lowest.
Response Smart home device, Wearables / contactless, and Other have the same Share of respondents.
The Response Smart home device has 4.47 times less Share of respondents than average.
